Layers.name: Data Sources Layer
Layers.purpose: Origination point for all biological data: omics files, literature corpora, and model interaction logs.

Layers.name: Data Ingestion & Acquisition Layer
Layers.purpose: Parse and ingest multi-modal omics data and biomedical references.

Layers.name: Unified Data Consolidation & Transformation Layer
Layers.purpose: Normalize and convert raw omics files into structured and vectorized forms.

Layers.name: AI & Advance Analytical Layer
Layers.purpose: Generate and explain omics-to-target hypotheses using generative and retrieval models.

Layers.name: Data Governance & Control Fabric
Layers.purpose: Ensure traceability and reproducibility of AI-generated hypotheses.

Layers.name: Platform Ops & Observability Layer
Layers.purpose: Monitor hypothesis generation pipeline, embedding service, and compute utilization.

Layers.name: Experience, Insights & Consumption Layer
Layers.purpose: Expose AI-generated targets and supporting evidence through interactive tools.
